channel.title: Changing Magic and Range XP Rates? DELTA 317
channel.description:
Hello,
Okay, so whenever I try using bronze arrows and a regular shortbow, I get xp for hitting 0s, and it seems all weird. I just want to know how to change the xp rates for that.
Also, magic xp rates.
Thanks.
EDIT: Also, prayer?
I looked for all of these but I couldn't find them...

item.title: Changing Magic and Range XP Rates? DELTA 317
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Whip Mod Whip
item.description:
@Mod_Whip wrote:

simplest way to do this- look at how much xp your getting and how much your hitting on the npc. divide the xp gained by the hit you delt, and search for that number (which will most likely be in your client class).

If I noticed that I hit an 8 with ranged and got 480 xp, then I would search for “60”.

Honestly haven’t worked with delta in a while, but this should be enough to get you started looking for it.

Good luck

Read full topic
item.source: Changing Magic and Range XP Rates? DELTA 317
